messages.content: hey jon, got any new game recs? looking for something epic to dive into.
oh dude, def check out "the last echo". it's got this wild fantasy world + the storyline is intense. been glued to it all week lol. graphics are insane. if u like rpgs, u'll love this. trust me.
hey jon, wanna catch the new marvel movie this friday?
oh hey, yeah that sounds cool. i'm down if i don't get dragged into something else lol
awesome! also, heard you're getting into those jail house workouts, how's that going?
lol yeah, trying to. it's tough but kinda fun? makes me feel like a superhero in training haha
ha, love that. btw, how's the writing been lately?
uh, idk. been in a bit of a spiral mood, so not much. trying to write something that doesn't sound like a dumpster fire lol
you'll get there. your stuff's always good, just gotta push through
appreciate it, really. just gotta find that spark again. or maybe just more coffee lol
Tell me what's on your mind, Jon.

oh man, just started this new gig at the retirement community and lemme tell ya, planning bingo night is more intense than any boss fight ive faced in dark souls haha. kinda feels weird tho, like im supposed to be this creative dude but here i am figuring out if we have enough prune juice for everyone. chris keeps telling me it's a good step but idk, feels like im just playin another character in this weird game called life. and this whole thing with my so, feels like im just a background npc in their story, not the co-op partner i signed up to be. lol guess im just in one of those spiraling moods again, gotta snap out of it and maybe dive into some zelda or something. escape into a world where i can actually slay the dragon, ya know?
